Reference

All functions

available()

Look up information on all available outsider modules

build_status()

Look-up details on program

default_log_set()

Set default log streams

.args_parse()

Parse arguments

.copy_from_docker()

Copy all contents from working dir

.copy_to_docker()

Copy files to docker container

.docker_build()

Build a docker image

.docker_cmd()

Run docker command

.docker_cp()

Copy files to and from container

.docker_exec()

Execute in a docker container

.docker_img_rm()

Remove docker image

.docker_ps_count()

Count docker processes

.docker_start()

Start a docker container

.docker_stop()

Stop and delete a docker container

.ids_get()

Get image ID and unique container ID

.pkgnm_to_prgm()

Convert pkgnm to prgm

.pkgnm_to_repo()

Convert pkgnm to repo

.repo_to_img()

Convert repo to image ID

.repo_to_pkgnm()

Convert repo to pkgnm

.run()

Run a command from a docker image

.to_basename()

Reduce to filepaths to basename

.travisyml_gen()

Generate travis file

.which_args_are_filepaths()

Determine which args are filepaths

fnames_get()

Function names for module

is_docker_available()

Check if Docker is available

is_filepath()

Is a filepath?

log_get()

Return log stream option

log_set()

Set log streams for console output

module_exists()

Does module exist?

module_help()

Get help for outsider modules

module_import()

Import functions from a module

module_install()

Install an outsider module

module_installed()

Is module installed?

module_test()

Test an outsider module

module_uninstall()

Uninstall and remove a module

om_search()

Search for outsider modules

om_yaml()

Module YAML information

outsider

outsider

test_examples()

Test whether module functions can be imported
